Package game.controller

Interface IGame4GewinnController

All Known Implementing Classes:
Game4GewinnController
public interface IGame4GewinnController
The interface of a controller from the perspective of a view object. All elements that are not part of this interface are invisible for the view.
Author:
Yohanes Kirana

  • Method Details

    • nextFrame

      GameState nextFrame()
      This method should be called whenever controller should decide what view should be displayed. The controller will call one of the drawX()_Methods from the view.
      Returns:
      State that is displayed.

    • startGame

      void startGame()
      Change the game state into start game.

    • insertMove

      void insertMove(int n)
      Distribute a move that a player made onto model. This method also check if the game already over.

    • checkBoard

      int checkBoard(int n)
      Distribute the condition of current board in model.
      Returns:
      Condition of board.

    • checkTurn

      int checkTurn()
      Get which turn of player is now making move.
      Returns:
      Turn of player.

    • getBoard

      int[] getBoard()
      Distribute the condition of current board in model.
      Returns:
      Array of content of the board.

    • prepareThread

      void prepareThread()
      Start ClientServerThreadClass without starting a thread.

    • newServer

      void newServer(int port)
      Initialize new server and start thread for server.
      Parameters:
      port - port of server.

    • sendMove

      void sendMove(int i)
      Send player's move into network.
      Parameters:
      i - move of player.

    • newClient

      void newClient(String ip, int port)
      Initialize new Client and start thread for client.
      Parameters:
      ip - ip address of client.
      port - port of client that should be identical to server.

    • getWinner

      void getWinner()
      This method check if the game already over.
